details:
Geeqie is a browser for graphics files offering single click viewing of
 your graphics files. It includes thumbnail view, zoom, filtering
 features and external editor support.
 uitoolkit::gtk, use::browsing, use::organizing, use::viewing,
 works-with-format::gif, works-with-format::jpg, works-with-format::png,
 works-with-format::tiff, works-with::image, works-with::image:raster,
 x11::application
